infos.value: ...Why have you taken pity on these scoundrels?
If I had them killed, the alliance with Wezette would be well and truly severed.
Mont, you are still soft as a newborn babe.
A dog left untamed will come back to bite you in the future, boy.
We do not know them... The only way to keep our alliance intact is to cut through them.
B-but Father...
King Oelde speaks wisely.
Y-you agree with him?
I am simply speaking the truth.
King Khury believes that only an alliance with Fennes can ensure Wezette's survival.
There is naught he would not do to ensure that it comes to fruition.
Does he feel so threatened by the alliance between Fennes and Hourne?
He does indeed.
Yet that threat has already dissipated. Their allegiance is no more.
What!? I-is that true!?
I, too, am simply speaking the truth.
If that is indeed the case, then surely you would be welcomed. At least...publicly.
Publicly?
It may sound odd, what I am about to tell you, but…
I think it would be best if you did not place your trust in King Khury.
After all, the king trusts no one—not even Lady Glaciela.
